alert.note: Alert for Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 12:44AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Baca County through 130 AM MDT... At 1244 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Campo, or 21 miles south of Springfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph, nickel size hail and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
